title: Eating Is Happiness!
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>*Munch*.... Hnn~, delicious~♪ I wonder how your Monja can taste this good, Ai-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ahaha. When you look that happy eating it, Ai feels like it was worth making them.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Alright, next up is this Mentai Mochi Cheese one!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Waaah, Mentai Mochi Cheese! I love these~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Come on, eat it~! Ah, this burned bit is definitely tasty! Here, Kotori, aaaan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>*Fyuuh* *Fyuuh*, aaaan.... Hnn~, this is happiness~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>It’s because our Monja is filled to the brim with love (Aijou), because you know, Ai! Just kidding.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu, I felt ple~nty of your love, Ai-chan♪ Then, Kotori will also return them, okay. Ai-chan, open wide.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Aaaaan.... *Munch Munch*.... Yep, it’s the best~! Ai feels like when you feed me, it makes it even tastier, Kotori.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Ehehe, eating delicious food makes you happy, but seeing your happy face is an entirely different kind of happiness, Ai-chan♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
